String.string: Decided to go to the underground with Syona.
Go to the castle grounds with Randun.
Echo of Castle Aranea
Underground Passage

Chapter 1: Continental Expedition

This echo seems to relate to the Dark Continent Expedition.

Join the Dark Continent Expedition to restore the Echo Arcana.
Underground Passage
Randun suddenly stopped.

Chapter 1: Continental Expedition

Follow Syona, Ribina, and Randun to learn why the Dark Continent Expedition is here.
Underground Passage
A beam of light shines from deep inside Castle Aranea.

Chapter 1: Continental Expedition

Find a way into Castle Aranea with the Dark Continent Expedition.
Monstrous Arena

Chapter 1: Continental Expedition

Follow the light.

Chapter 2: Devan Prisoner

Follow the Dark Continent Expedition into the Monstrous Arena.

Chapter 2: Devan Prisoner

Defeat Greandale with Syona and Ribina.

Chapter 3: Two Paths

Nemato knows what the Dark Continent Expedition is looking for.

Listen to Nemato's story.
Underground Entrance
Ground Entrance

Chapter 3: Two Paths

If you go with Syona, it leads underground, and if you go with Randun, it leads to the castle grounds.

Select who you want to go with, and move to that entrance.
Castle Dungeons

Chapter 4: Sub-Devans

Nemato speaks of a place where sub-devans like him live under the castle.

Follow Nemato with Syona.
Slave Pens Entrance

Chapter 4: Sub-Devans

There's the distinctive odor of sewage. How can sub-devans live in such a place?

Keep following Nemato.
Slave Pens Exit

Chapter 4: Sub-Devans

Nemato points to the Slave Pens where the sub-devans stay. Nemato explains how bad Imperial Puppets are.

Enter the Slave Pens and defeat all Imperial Puppets.
Castle Sewers
It seems there are corpses in the castle sewers.

Chapter 4: Sub-Devans

Syona is grim after seeing how the sub-devans live. Nemato seems not to be bothered and is providing guidance again.

Follow Nemato with Syona.
Torture Chamber Entrance

Chapter 4: Sub-Devans

Syona is distracted by an implement of blood magic after seeing the piles of sub-devan corpses. Continue alone until Syona finishes her investigation.

Follow the path up.
Torture Chamber Exit

Chapter 5: Chamber Secrets

Tools for torture and blood stains litter the floor. Two torturers approach with a smile.

Defeat Sereken and Masuki and escape the Torture Chamber.
Secret Passage

Chapter 5: Chamber Secrets

Get as far as possible from the Torture Chamber before another torturer shows up.

Follow Nemato.
Secret Stairs

Chapter 5: Chamber Secrets

Nemato says there's a secret door that leads to Anea's Palace at the top of the stairs. It seems the archdevans like to stay near their toys.

Go to the top of the stairs.
Secret Stairs Exit
Made it inside Anea's Palace

Chapter 5: Chamber Secrets

If Nemato is right, Anea's Palace should be behind this wall.

Find and operate the lever, then exit via the secret door.
Elevator Ride

Chapter 4: Scholarly Pursuit

Excited after hearing about a new weapon, Randun promptly disappeared from sight. There must be an elevator nearby.

Ride the elevator.

Chapter 4: Scholarly Pursuit

Randun's voice echoes down from above.
Exit the elevator
Found an empty space in Castle Aranea.

Chapter 4: Scholarly Pursuit

Get off the elevator and join Randun.
Weapons Lab

Chapter 4: Scholarly Pursuit

Be careful: Nearby soldiers will converge if we're spotted by an archdevan archer with night vision.

Avoid the archdevan archers and move to the Weapons Lab.

Chapter 5: War Machine

Randun's spotted the weapon he wanted to see.

Examine the War Crawler weapon.

Chapter 5: War Machine

Randun made a mess of things. Make things right before archdevans arrive.

Defeat the War Crawler.
Anea's Palace Entrance

Chapter 5: War Machine

Randun found the weapon designs. It's dangerous to move Randun when he has designs on the brain, so it's better to continue alone like he suggested.

Exit the Weapons Lab and look for Anea's Palace.
Throne Room
Made it to Anea's Palace.

Chapter 5: War Machine

The palace is like a fortress. Its exterior is strong and well decorated.

Enter the Throne Room.

Chapter 6: Secret Power

You've reached the Throne Room. No time to wait for the dark continent expedition to join.

Defeat Commander Heskia.
Queen's Chamber

Chapter 6: Secret Power

Finally arrived at the Queen's Chamber, where Nemato claimed to see what the Dark Continent Expedition were seeking.

Enter the Queen's Chamber.

Chapter 6: Secret Power

Defeat Anea.

Chapter 7: Nemato

Anea (or Aranea) continued to blame people right up until she died. Does this have something to do with what Nemato did?
Where Nemato disappeared
Nemato can't be found.

Chapter 7: Changed Man

The expedition senses the strangeness of Nemato's actions.

Move to where Nemato disappeared.

Chapter 7: Changed Man

The map the expedition was looking for must be in this crate.

Destroy the crate.

Chapter 7: Changed Man

It seems most of the memory was restored.

Chapter 7: Changed Man

The Echo Arcana reappeared. There must be a change in it.

Take a closer look.

Chapter 7: Changed Man

Go back to your time and tell the barakas what memories you restored so far.

Use the Teleportal to meet Gadin in Highwatch.
